name: Lost Home
description: Lost Home is a 2D adventure game with a platformer spirit. you'll play as an armadillo and a snake, who'll have to work together in order to find themselves a new home.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. Storage: 1100 MB available space
